files.patch:
@@ -29,2 +29,1 @@
-  NUM_CORES=1
-  FOUND_CORES=no
+  NUM_CORES=0
@@ -38,3 +37,0 @@
-    if test "$NUM_CORES" -ne "0"; then
-      FOUND_CORES=yes
-    fi
@@ -44,1 +40,0 @@
-    FOUND_CORES=yes
@@ -49,1 +44,0 @@
-      FOUND_CORES=yes
@@ -54,1 +48,0 @@
-    FOUND_CORES=yes
@@ -57,3 +50,2 @@
-  if test "x$FOUND_CORES" = xyes; then
-    AC_MSG_RESULT([$NUM_CORES])
-  else
+  if test "$NUM_CORES" -eq "0"; then
+    NUM_CORES=1
@@ -62,0 +54,2 @@
+  else
+    AC_MSG_RESULT([$NUM_CORES])
